    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.contento.se:112446</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CFL</catalog>
            <entry>112446</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Indefinite Article (a - an)</string>
            <string language="en">Indefinite articles (a - an)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unbestimmte Artikel (a -)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Articles indéfinis (a -)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artigos indefinidos (a -)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Articoli indefiniti (a -)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αόριστα άρθρα (α -)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artículos indeterminados (a -)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">In this exercise you practise the use of the indefinite article at the same time as you learn some new words.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 1 - Let’s Begin!</string>
            <string language="en">In this exercise you practice the use of the indefinite article at the same time as you learn some new words. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 1 - Let's Begin!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">Grammar</string>
            <string language="sv">Indefinite Article</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">Grammar</string>
            <string language="en">Indefinite Article</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Übung üben Sie den Gebrauch von dem 
unbestimmten Artikel, zur gleichen Zeit wie Sie einige neue Wörter 
erlernen. Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - 
Modul 1 - lassen Sie uns anfangen!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cet exercice vous pratiquez l'utilisation de 
l'article indéfini pendant que vous apprenez quelques nouveaux mots. 
Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - le module 
1 - commençons !</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste exercício você pratica o uso do artigo 
indefinido ao mesmo tempo que você aprende algumas palavras novas. 
Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento para novatos - o 
módulo 1 - deixe-nos começar!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa esercitazione vi esercitate nell'uso 
dell'articolo indefinito nello stesso momento in cui imparate alcune 
nuove parole. Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i principianti -
modulo 1 - cominciamo!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την άσκηση ασκείτε τη χρήση του αόριστου 
άρθρου την ίδια στιγμή που μαθαίνετε μερικές νέες λέξεις. 
Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους 
αρχαρίους - ενότητα 1 - αρχίστε!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este ejercicio usted practica el uso del 
artículo indeterminado al mismo tiempo que usted aprende algunas 
nuevas palabras. ¡Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los 
principiantes - el módulo 1 - comencemos!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saphir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
